attributes.additional_details: Tonbridge & Malling Borough Council have created an abhorrent Local Plan to build thousands of houses on the Greenbelt adjoining Areas of Outstanding Natural Beauty AONB
attributes.background:
We call on the Government to reverse its position on Metropolitan Greenbelt, and to require Local Planning Authorities and the Planning Inspectorate to maintain and protect the Greenbelt.
Tonbridge and Malling being our example of many Greenbelt Borough's in danger of losing that protection.
